tool_description: On-board, Connect, Access or Verify your users’ crypto portfolio data. Blockmate API allows you to easily interact with Web3 users in your app.
title: Blockmate crypto account connector

api_list.name: UpdateUser
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blockmate-crypto-account-connector.p.rapidapi.com/v1/users/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blockmate-crypto-account-connector.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

balance.title: Balance response
balance.description: Represents a response from aggregated balance request.

last_sync.description: null if initial sync was not yet done

    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: Transactions

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description:
Set time from which the transactions will be get.
The parameter is passed as-is to backend services.
The default value is 30 days before the actual date or 30 days before the date specified in "until" parameter.

optional_parameters.name: account-filter
optional_parameters.description:
Filter results to only provided account.
When omitted, it returns all transactions from all accounts.

optional_parameters.name: until
optional_parameters.description:
Set time to which the transactions will be get.
The parameter is passed as-is to backend services.
The default value is the actual date.

last_sync.description: null if initial sync was not yet done
